description:
Various settings for the Panel. The following options are available: 
Visibility, can be set to "autohide" and "overview only". In the "Overview Only" mode the panel will be displayed only when the overview mode is active (top-left corner). 
Edge, can be set to "Top" and "Bottom". When in Bottom edge the top-left hot-corner is still active.

Known Issues: 
There is no HotCorner for the message tray when the panel edge is set to bottom. It is shown only at the overview.
name: Panel Settings
